text: balke sub se zyaada dunya ki zindagi ka harees aye Nabi! aap inhee ko payenge, ye hirs zindagi mein mushriko se bhi zyaada hai in mein se to har shaqs ek ek hazaar saal ki umr chahta hai, go ye umr diya jaana bhi unhe azaab se nahi choda sakta, Allah taâ€™ala un ke kaamo ko ba-qoobi dekh raha hai
